Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Tata Group of companies will no longer recruit any JNU students, which is not supported by any evidence or official statement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Tata Group of companies has made such a decision.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Tata Group has clarified in the past that no such statement was made by Ratan Tata.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that JNU students are not faithful to the country, which is a problematic assumption without any basis or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the viral message is false and has been debunked by Tata Group and various news organizations.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing any credible source or official statement to support its assertion.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
